languages.text: С молитвой приступили к труду зодчие. В согласии с наставлениями святых и параметрами Стандартной Шаблонной Конструкции возвели они жилые блоки обширные, и крепкие стены для форта дружины планетарной, и обширный аудиторум, чтобы торговалися и хранилися там товары, и гордый цензорум, чтобы клерки и серво-холопы блюли в стенах его порядок и статистику.

After a prayer, the architects set to work. In accordance with the saints' teachings and the parameters set forth in the Standard Template Construct, they erected spacious living quarters, and sturdy fort walls for the planetary militia, and a spacious auditorum wherein to trade and store goods, and a proud censorum within whose walls clerks and servo-bondsmen would maintain order and keep statistical records.
languages.original_text: С молитвой приступили к труду зодчие. В согласии с наставлениями святых и параметрами Стандартной Шаблонной Конструкции возвели они жилые блоки обширные, и крепкие стены для форта дружины планетарной, и обширный аудиторум, чтобы торговалися и хранилися там товары, и гордый цензорум, чтобы клерки и серво-холопы блюли в стенах его порядок и статистику.

In accordance with the saints' teachings and the parameters set forth in the Standard Construction Template, they erected spacious living quarters, and sturdy fort walls for the planetary militia, and a spacious auditorum wherein to trade and store goods, and a proud censorum within whose walls clerks and servo-bondsmen would maintain order and keep statistical records.

After a prayer, the architects set to work. In accordance with the saints' teachings and the parameters set forth in the Standard Construction Template, they erected spacious living quarters, and sturdy fort walls for the planetary militia, and a spacious auditorum wherein to trade and store goods, and a proud censorum within whose walls clerks and servo-bondsmen would maintain order and keep statistical records.

After a prayer, the architects set to work. In accordance with the saints' teachings and the parameters set forth in the Standard Template Construct, they erected spacious living quarters, and sturdy fort walls for the planetary militia, and a spacious auditorum wherein to trade and store goods, and a proud censorum within whose walls clerks and servo-bondsmen would maintain order and keep statistical records.

languages.text: Tras una oración, los arquitectos comenzaron a trabajar. Conforme a las enseñanzas de los santos y los parámetros de la plantilla de construcción estándar, erigieron amplias zonas residenciales y recios muros fortificados para la milicia planetaria, así como un gran auditorio donde comerciar y almacenar bienes y un magnífico censorum, bajo cuyo techo el personal administrativo y los servofiadores mantenían el orden y los registros estadísticos.
languages.original_text: After a prayer, the architects set to work. In accordance with the saints' teachings and the parameters set forth in the Standard Template Construct, they erected spacious living quarters, and sturdy fort walls for the planetary militia, and a spacious auditorum wherein to trade and store goods, and a proud censorum within whose walls clerks and servo-bondsmen would maintain order and keep statistical records.

traits.locale_text: Tras una oración, los arquitectos comenzaron a trabajar. Conforme a las enseñanzas de los santos y los parámetros de la plantilla de construcción estándar, erigieron amplias zonas residenciales y recios muros fortificados para la milicia planetaria, así como un gran auditorio donde comerciar y almacenar bienes y un magnífico censorum, bajo cuyo techo el personal administrativo y los servofiadores mantenían el orden y los registros estadísticos.

languages.text: 祈祷结束之后，建筑师们便开始工作了。他们根据圣人的教诲以及标准建造模板中规定的参数，建造了宽敞的生活区、坚固的高墙，以及大型仓储区域，用于储存与交易货物。此外，他们还建造了一间完备的审计大厅，供文职人员与伺服保障人员维持秩序，存储各种统计记录。
languages.original_text: After a prayer, the architects set to work. In accordance with the saints' teachings and the parameters set forth in the Standard Template Construct, they erected spacious living quarters, and sturdy fort walls for the planetary militia, and a spacious auditorum wherein to trade and store goods, and a proud censorum within whose walls clerks and servo-bondsmen would maintain order and keep statistical records.

traits.locale_text: 祈祷结束之后，建筑师们便开始工作了。他们根据圣人的教诲以及标准建造模板中规定的参数，建造了宽敞的生活区、坚固的高墙，以及大型仓储区域，用于储存与交易货物。此外，他们还建造了一间完备的审计大厅，供文职人员与伺服保障人员维持秩序，存储各种统计记录。

languages.text: 祈りが終わると、建設作業員は作業に取り掛かる。聖人の教えと、標準テンプレート生産で定められたパラメータに従って、広々とした居住区、惑星民兵用の頑丈な要塞壁、商品の取引と保管を目的にした大きなホール、そして壁内に事務員とサーヴォ・ボンドマンが秩序を守り、統計記録をつけるための堂々たる検閲所を建てた。
languages.original_text: After a prayer, the architects set to work. In accordance with the saints' teachings and the parameters set forth in the Standard Template Construct, they erected spacious living quarters, and sturdy fort walls for the planetary militia, and a spacious auditorum wherein to trade and store goods, and a proud censorum within whose walls clerks and servo-bondsmen would maintain order and keep statistical records.

traits.locale_text: 祈りが終わると、建設作業員は作業に取り掛かる。聖人の教えと、標準テンプレート生産で定められたパラメータに従って、広々とした居住区、惑星民兵用の頑丈な要塞壁、商品の取引と保管を目的にした大きなホール、そして壁内に事務員とサーヴォ・ボンドマンが秩序を守り、統計記録をつけるための堂々たる検閲所を建てた。

languages.text: Nach einem Gebet machten die Architekten sich an die Arbeit. In Übereinkunft mit den Lehren der Heiligen und den Vorgaben im Standardtechnologiekonstrukt errichteten sie geräumige Wohnbereiche, stabile Außenmauern für die planetare Miliz, einen großen Saal für den Handel mit Waren und ihre Lagerung sowie ein stolzes Censorum, in dem Beamte und Servo-Leibeigene die Ordnung bewahrten und statistische Aufzeichnungen führten.
languages.original_text: After a prayer, the architects set to work. In accordance with the saints' teachings and the parameters set forth in the Standard Template Construct, they erected spacious living quarters, and sturdy fort walls for the planetary militia, and a spacious auditorum wherein to trade and store goods, and a proud censorum within whose walls clerks and servo-bondsmen would maintain order and keep statistical records.

traits.locale_text: Nach einem Gebet machten die Architekten sich an die Arbeit. In Übereinkunft mit den Lehren der Heiligen und den Vorgaben im Standardtechnologiekonstrukt errichteten sie geräumige Wohnbereiche, stabile Außenmauern für die planetare Miliz, einen großen Saal für den Handel mit Waren und ihre Lagerung sowie ein stolzes Censorum, in dem Beamte und Servo-Leibeigene die Ordnung bewahrten und statistische Aufzeichnungen führten.

languages.text: Après une prière, les architectes se mettent au travail. Conformément aux enseignements des saints et aux modèles préconisés par le Schéma de Construction Standardisé, ils font ériger de vastes quartiers d'habitation aux murs d'enceinte renforcés pour la milice planétaire, un auditorium spacieux pour le stockage et le commerce de marchandises,ainsi qu'un formidable censorum dans lequel clercs et agents servo-liés maintiennent l'ordre et les registres statistiques.
languages.original_text: After a prayer, the architects set to work. In accordance with the saints' teachings and the parameters set forth in the Standard Template Construct, they erected spacious living quarters, and sturdy fort walls for the planetary militia, and a spacious auditorum wherein to trade and store goods, and a proud censorum within whose walls clerks and servo-bondsmen would maintain order and keep statistical records.

traits.locale_text: Après une prière, les architectes se mettent au travail. Conformément aux enseignements des saints et aux modèles préconisés par le Schéma de Construction Standardisé, ils font ériger de vastes quartiers d'habitation aux murs d'enceinte renforcés pour la milice planétaire, un auditorium spacieux pour le stockage et le commerce de marchandises,ainsi qu'un formidable censorum dans lequel clercs et agents servo-liés maintiennent l'ordre et les registres statistiques.

languages.text: Bir duanın ardından mimarlar işe koyuldu. Azizlerin öğretilerince ve Standart Şablon Yapısı'na göre belirlenen parametrelerce geniş bir yaşam alanı, gezegen askeriyesi için dayanıklı kale duvarları, ticaret yapmak ve ürün depolamak için geniş bir salon ve kâtipler ile hizmetkâr kölelerin düzeni sağlayıp istatistiki kayıtlar tutacağı ulu bir sansüryum inşa ettiler.
languages.original_text: After a prayer, the architects set to work. In accordance with the saints' teachings and the parameters set forth in the Standard Template Construct, they erected spacious living quarters, and sturdy fort walls for the planetary militia, and a spacious auditorum wherein to trade and store goods, and a proud censorum within whose walls clerks and servo-bondsmen would maintain order and keep statistical records.
